none: You good letter reached me some days ago - it was like precious ointment February 2, 1880

body.value:
"Your good letter reached me
some days ago - It was like
precious ointment" 2-7-80

"I read it with avidity & enjoyed
it immensely." 4-21-80

"Your good letter ... was like ointment
on Aaron's beard" 2-16-80
